h369_multicategory_ensemble.finding: MinRank ensemble helps cancer (+10.5pp) and neuro (+5.3pp) but hurts autoimmune (-5.6pp)
h369_multicategory_ensemble.conclusion: Ensemble only helps when methods have equal performance

h370_adaptive_selection.finding: 10% threshold achieves 72.4% R@30 (+1.0pp vs MinRank, +4.8pp vs best single)
h370_adaptive_selection.rule: If |target-kNN| >= 10%, use dominant method; else use MinRank ensemble

h371_gene_coverage.finding: Gene count helps Target but doesn't make it superior to kNN overall
